contents.name: Tilt
contents.description: Mirror tilt as a percent. 0 = Center Position. 100 = Fully Upward Position. -100 = Fully Downward Position.

contents.name: Pan
contents.description: Mirror pan as a percent. 0 = Center Position. 100 = Fully Left Position. -100 = Fully Right Position.

contents.name: Heating
contents.description: Mirror Heater on or off. True = Heater On. False = Heater Off.
